items.sentence: I left home later than usual, but I was still able to catch the train that I usually catch.
All you have to do is to cultivate the ability to put yourself in the other fellow's place.
Tom was surprised when he saw Mary eating meat because she'd told him she was a vegetarian.
When I crashed the family car, my father was so mad that he said he was going to disown me.
You know your French is good when people stop complimenting you on how good your French is.
